title: What is the purpose of life?
content: Deep in thought this morning, wondering if anyone has an answer.

title: Bought a new car!
content: Well, new to me at least. It's a 1997 Honda Accord. I'm in love with it!

title: New game idea!
content: I'm thinking of making a game where you play as a cat and you have to knock things off of tables. I think it could be a hit!
